GSD.description:
USB: host: isp116x: check return value after calling platform_get_resource()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.122 by commit ee105039d3653444de4d3ede642383c92855dc1e. For more details please see the references link.
